description:
Give yourself better tools to do your job well. During our Memorial Day sale, you can get Microsoft Office Professional 2021 for Windows for more than $150 off. But act fast, because the price will go back up after 5/31.

Rated 4.9/5 stars, this lifetime license offers instant delivery and download of the complete Microsoft Office suite: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote, Teams, Publishe
title: Get Microsoft Office 2021 for $50 through May

description:
Sick of dealing with the clunky trackpad design of the standard Apple TV remote? Maybe it’s time to make a switch. This Memorial Day, you can get the Function101 Button Remote for Apple TV/Apple TV 4K for $6 off.

Rated 4.3/5 stars, this infrared remote is just like the more classic remotes you’re used to, but it’s calibrated to work with all Apple TV or Apple TV 4K models (as well as many 4K TVs). The remote has clear buttons to navigate interfaces, adj
title: This Apple TV remote has actual buttons and it’s $6 off
